About

Hey! My name is William An and I am a recent graduate of University of California, San Diego (2017, Physics B.s.)

More Information

This blog is for me to document my experience learning and playing with various computer technologies and topics. I hope it will be of some use to anyone who happens to take a look!

I am interested in pursuing a career in data science.

When I am not working on a computer, I like to surf and swim.
